snippet.title: Saci: The Cursed Hunt Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
We’d like to introduce Saci: The Cursed Hunt, a survival horror game inspired by Brazilian folklore, set deep in the Amazon rainforest. In the game, players are pursued by Saci, a one-legged legendary figure from Brazilian folklore known for his mischievous tricks and sometimes dangerous nature. To survive, players must find five objects to capture the Saci while navigating the rainforest’s natural perils.

This game is made by a small independent team fuelled by a passion for creating an immersive and atmospheric experience. We’re excited to share our first teaser showing gameplay from our fantastic world.

🌪️The storm that is our indie videogame, Saci: The Cursed Hunt is still brewing. ⚡ But this week we’re celebrating Saci Day with a strike of lightning of sorts. Well okay, it’s just a teaser.

https://store.steampowered.com/app/3265750/Saci_The_Cursed_Hunt
